name: Do Damage
description:
This game was made in one hour for the 1 HOUR JAM - Challenge de la semaine UNLEASHED jam. It's unfortunately not as good as my previous entries to the previous iteration of this jam, especially Magician's Assistant but nonetheless, I had fun.

Wasted most of my time on the map and the opening cinematic and unfortunately didn't have enough time to polish up the gameplay after the cutscene :( Was my first time participating with GameMaker too, it's been a while since I last used it and I'm still not really used to GameMaker Studio 2 so I lost some time messing around with layers and autotiles

Also available for download is the GameMaker project file for those who want to see the game code. Remember to credits the assets authors (see below) if you make anything out of it.

Left Click on Knight to Heal

Battle controls :
Arrows or WASD to move
Left Click to throw Scythes
Right Click to launch Bombs

Credits :
Pico-8 tiles by Kicked-In-Teeth
Explosions by ansimuz
Pixelated Attack/Hit Animations by Viktor
